channel.title: Movies on Grad Student Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Jumanji
item.description: I love movies. I watch a lot of movies, I watch movies about movies, I watch documentaries about movies, I read articles about movies. Sadly I no longer have DC++ so I have to find other ways to do this, like actually going to theaters and paying money to watch. If you think about all the movies that have come out in the recent times they’re either all crap or all very serious.
